sentences.en: He did a terrific amount of fundraising.
sentences.cn: 他做了大量的筹款工作。

sentences.en: He had a terrific sense of humour and could be very amusing.
sentences.cn: 他极具幽默感，很会逗人发笑。

sentences.en: He is a terrific athlete and a brilliant jumper.
sentences.cn: 他是个出色的运动员，弹跳力非常好。
我今天的感觉真是好极了！

sentences.en: In that 2.7-litre form it really was a terrific racing car.
sentences.cn: 其2.7升的车型确实是非常棒的赛车。
她是个非常不错的女孩，活泼而开朗。

sentences.en: Sue let out a terrific shriek and leapt out of the way.
sentences.cn: 休发出一声尖叫，跳到了一边。

sentences.en: The actress who played the lawyer was terrific.
sentences.cn: 扮演律师的女演员表演十分出色。

sentences.en: The whole lobby was a perfect pandemonium, and the din was terrific.
sentences.cn: 整个门厅一片嘈杂, 而且喧嚣刺耳.

sentences.en: Then the hair began to grow again and I felt terrific.
sentences.cn: 然后，头发又长起来了，我感觉棒极了。

sentences.en: There were terrific rejoicings on the day war ended.
sentences.cn: 战争结束的那一天人们狂欢庆祝.
他们有几个技术一流的罚球手。

sentences.en: You look terrific, Ann. You really do.
sentences.cn: 安，你看起来太迷人了。真的。

words.tran_cn: 可怕的；很糟的；令人讨厌的
令人恐惧的；骇人的；极大的
使害怕，使恐怖（terrify的现在分词）

trans.tran_cn: 极好的，异乎寻常的，很大的，了不起的
trans.tran_en: very good, especially in a way that makes you feel happy and excited
